name: Ildiko Rejto
description:
If someone told us when we started this website that we're going to write over 1500 profiles...

Of which 250 were of athletes...

Of which 73 were of Olympians...

Oh which 40 were of Jewish medalists...

Of which, let's get down to it, five were of Jewish, Olympic, medalist FENCERS...

Oh which two were of Jewish, Olympic, medalist, female, Hungarian fencers...

Oh which one was of a Jewish, Olympic, seven-time medalist, female, Hungarian, DEAF fencer...

We would have told them they were nuts.

And yet, here we are.
